sentence: straighten and move the rightmost purple block to the back of the leftmost purple block

pick up the purple block that is in front of the rearmost purple block and move it to the right of the rearmost yellow block so that the purple block's rear left corner touches the yellow block's right corner
move the middle gold block to the front left side of the block you just moved before
pick up the yellow block behind the block you just moved and place it on top of the block in front of it
pick up the purple block which is on the left side of the moved yellow blocks to the front side of the rightmost purple block
